subject: Implement offline queue for IES Reader
body: Implement the OfflineQueue class per docs/plans/2025-12-06-cross-app-sync-design.md Section 3. Location: ies/reader/src/lib/offlineQueue.ts. Key requirements: (1) localStorage persistence, (2) retry with exponential backoff (5s, 30s, 2min), (3) max 50 operations, (4) integrate with graphClient.ts saveJourney(). See design doc for full TypeScript interfaces.
